channel.title: Compile error help please!
channel.description:
This is the current compiler I have, [code]javac -d bin -cp lib/*; -sourcepath src src/org/dementhium/*.java[/code]
[code] "javac: invalid flag: lib/mysql.jar Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options compile.sh: line 1: -sourcepath: command not found [/code] can someone please help me fix this error? thanks!

item.title: Compile error help please!
item.dc:creator: @MonkeyMad MonkeyMad
item.description:
@MonkeyMad wrote:

This is the current compiler I have,

"javac: invalid flag: lib/mysql.jar Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options compile.sh: line 1: -sourcepath: command not found
can someone please help me fix this error?
thanks!
